benchmark_details.name: NOVEL-WD
benchmark_details.overview: NOVEL-WD is a dataset containing sentences with novel facts extracted from recent Wikidata updates, designed for evaluating the capability of Large Language Models (LLMs) in learning and recalling new world knowledge through prefix-tuning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To explore how pre-trained language models can learn new factual knowledge efficiently, using a dataset derived from Wikidata updates.

data.annotation: Manually edited where necessary after generation from prompts.

methodology.calculation: Perplexity measured against the training set; accuracy calculated on multiple choice tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and lower perplexity indicate better performance in learning and recalling factual information.
methodology.baseline_results: The baseline model shows 3.0% to 6.3% accuracy, while prefix-tuned models reach a peak accuracy of 29.1% for k=3.
